name: Fantasy Mosaics 12
description:
Join our penguin on a new mosaics journey to a parallel universe abundant with new colorful logic puzzles!

Help the penguin find a key to solving the mystery of the parallel world and discover its inhabitants!

Enjoy the challenge and complete custom built mosaic images based on the logic of numbers!

This new installment of fantasy mosaics brings you a vivid gallery in a variety of colors.


- Multi-color mosaic puzzles also known as picross, hanjie, nonograms, griddlers, paint by numbers.

- Discover a parallel world of mosaics

- Stunning background art

- Puzzles based on logic
